summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Sharda Lead Management Dashboard new features: Export to Excel, Template download, Form field dropdowns, Follow-up date picker, and Open Leads charts. All requested features are successfully implemented and working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend API: GET /api/leads/dropdown-options returns form dropdown values
Backend API: GET /api/leads/export?format=xlsx downloads Excel file
Backend API: GET /api/leads/template downloads template Excel file
Backend API: GET /api/insights/top-performers?metric=open supports Open Leads metric
Backend API: GET /api/insights/monthly-trends returns monthly data
Frontend: Add Lead form has text inputs for Name, Phone, Email (correct)
Frontend: Add Lead form has dropdowns for Zone, State, Area, Dealer, Employee, Segment, Status, Stage, Type, Source, Customer Type (correct)
Frontend: Add Lead form has date picker for Planned Follow-up Date (correct)
Frontend: Export button is present and enabled
Frontend: Template button is present and working
Navigation: All page navigation working correctly
